title: Can I log in to my online bank account from my phone?
answer:
Yes. It is recommended that you install the online bank client on your phone Logging in to your online bank account using the browser on your phone may fail as some banks' login plug-ins can only run in Microsoft Internet Explorer. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111466)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111467)
